description: Guacamole has to be among the tastiest condiments. Whip this up in a flash, combining avocado, coriander and sour cream with chipotle peppers for a smoky hit.
keywords: Guacamole,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Tomato,Avocado,Peanut free
name: Smoky Guacamole Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 chipotle pepper in adobo sauce, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Scoop flesh from avocado into a bowl. Roughly mash. Add lemon juice, sour cream, tomato, onion, chipotle pepper and chopped coriander. Stir to combine. Transfer to a serving bowl. Serve with corn chips and garnish platter with coriander sprigs.
